Package CAMs_App.boundary

Class CampComMenu

java.lang.Object
CAMs_App.boundary.CampComMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Menu
public class CampComMenu extends Object implements Menu
The CampComMenu implements the generic menu, Menu. It provides methods to print the main menu and viewing the application. The class uses campComController to manage camp committee-related activities and also uses CampManagementService in generating reports.

  • Method Details

    • printMenu

      public void printMenu()
      The printMenu() method displays the camp menu options available for the camp committee user. It prints camp committee menu options such as view camp details, view enquiries, reply enquiries, create suggestions, view own suggestions, delete own suggestions, generate enquiries report, generate attendence report, switch to user mode and logout.
      Specified by:
      printMenu in interface Menu

    • viewApp

      public void viewApp()
      The viewApp() method allows camp committee user to perform various camp related actions for the selected camp such as

      • View camp details : Camp Committee user view camp details thorugh CampComController.viewCampDetails().
      • View enquiries : Camp Committee user view the camp's enquiries through CampComController.viewAllEnquiries().
      • Reply enquiries : Camp Committee user reply the camp's enquiries through CampComController.replyEnquiry().
      • Create suggestions : Camp Committee user creates suggestions for the camp through CampComController.createSuggestion().
      • View your suggestions : Camp Committee user view thier own suggestions for the camp through CampComController.viewSuggestion().
      • Delete your suggestions : Camp Committee user deletes their own suggestions for the camp through CampComController.deleteSuggestion().
      • Generate enquiries report : Camp Committee user creates suggestions for the camp through CampManagementService.enquiriesReport().
      • Generate attendence suggestions : Camp Committee user creates suggestions for the camp through CampManagementService.generateStudentListReport(), filterable by faculty or default.
      • Switch to camp committe mode : Camp Committee user will switch into a student mode Student.
      • Logout : Camp Committee user logs out from the system and returning to the MainMenu.

      Invalid inputs prompts the user to choose again.

      Specified by:
      viewApp in interface Menu
